Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; GROUND; PAINTED
Name: Jug
Description: Large-sized jug. Rounded rim, ovoid body and pointed base. The paste is orangey in colour. The exerior surface is covered with a red-coloured coating, smoothed down with a palette knife. There is a painted decoration, consisting of horizontal bands which encircle the body of the piece. At the top and on the neck we find a geometrical and vegetal decoration which is arranged in metopae, in a very dark red colour, of a schematic type.
